alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 9:12PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Fremont County through 945 PM MDT... At 911 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Ocean Lake to 6 miles northwest of Hudson. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. Strong winds will occur well ahead of the line of storms. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Arapahoe around 930 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Riverton and Shoshoni. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Lander Foothills; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Wind River Basin
